thread.title: SEC Drops Case Against New York Financier Benjamin Wey’s Sister

author: Maria Armental
title: SEC Drops Case Against New York Financier Benjamin Wey’s Sister

organizations.name: sec drops case against new york

text:
Wall Street’s top regulator has dropped a civil case against the sister of Benjamin Wey, a New York financier who was arrested in 2015 on charges he illegally profited from “reverse mergers.”
The Securities and Exchange Commission on Thursday dismissed its case against Tianyi Wei, Mr. Wey’s sister, who had been accused of participating in the alleged scheme.
